name: Lily the Bee (Klosenlinks)
description:
Story

This is the story of Lily the bee,   against moths threatening her hive,   each time trying to stay alive,   which is now a kind of monotony.   Some nectar can help her,   quitting this boring loop,   but will this kind of soup,   get her into another?  

Controls

* __← → :__ Move the Bee

*__Space:__ Shoot

* __Enter:__ Drink nectar

Softwares & ressources

* Unity & Visual Studio

* Krita

* Tracktion Waveform & Audacity

* Font: https://www.dafont.com/fr/schoolwork.font

Credits

Video game made for Ludum Dare 47!

* Writing, coding & integration: Votre Pseudo

* Drawings & animations: Hyblis29

* Writing, sounds & music ♫: Klosenlinks

_Thanks for playing! Feel free to leave a feedback ☺_
